snippet.title: Violet: A 2D platformer where colors can be turned on or off
snippet.description:
A download link to my game, as well as controls and additional information, can be found here:
http://bacongamejam.org/jams/bacongamejam-06/196/

The version I play in the video is slightly updated; some levels are modified, some are brand new and one level is removed (but you won't miss it). Unfortunately it is only available for Windows at the moment.

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Game jams are friendly events where participants create their own game over a set short period of time, based on a randomly selected central theme. For Bacon Game Jam 06 the theme was "Rainbows" and the time limit was 48 hours (one weekend). You can find all the fantastic entries here:
http://bacongamejam.org/jams/bacongamejam-06/games/

For my game I decided on a fast-paced 2D platformer where the player has to work out how to turn certain colors of the rainbow on or off in order to beat each level. I also included a narrative to give the game more depth, but I'm still on the fence about whether or not I like how that part turned out. Let me know what you think! Comments and constructive criticism is warmly encouraged.
